dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Glucoamylase is amongst the most widely used and oldest catalysts in the food processing industry. It functions in the saccharification of partially produced dextrin or starch to glucose, making it a vital substrate for several fermentation processes and a wide range of beverages. It is also known as the type of enzyme that can easily break down starches into glucose, which afterwards becomes usable and absorbable, thus reducing stomach upsets and other potential digestive problems.
葡萄糖淀粉酶是食品加工业中应用最广泛、历史最悠久的催化剂之一。它的作用是将部分生产的糊精或淀粉糖化为葡萄糖，使其成为多种发酵工艺和各种饮料的重要底物。它也是一种能轻松将淀粉分解成葡萄糖的酶，之后葡萄糖就可以被利用和吸收，从而减少胃部不适和其他潜在的消化问题。
